Have you looked at @ClassRule?
On Dec 17, 2015 2:05 PM, "ilke Muhtaroglu il=
ke.muhtaroglu@...
[junit]" <junit@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

>
>
>
>
> =
I have a Junit test classes with differening amount of unit test methods
> =
in it.
>
> I want to detect when a class finishes running its test methods,=
 so that I
> can do a computation.
>
> How can I detect when a class finish=
es its unit test methods ? Via
> teardown method or something similar ? And=
 how can I similary understand
> that a test suite made of Junit test class=
es finishes its call ?
>
> Thanks
>
> 
>

--001a11c124d4a77e9105272241bf
